data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.3.1 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.4 PB 3
data.actual_result: App crashes after starting to type the blocked user's name.
data.short_description: App crashes when searching for blocked users with quick switcher
data.steps_to_repro: - Block any user/bot - Open the quick switcher - Use `@` to only show users - Then start typing the name of the blocked user/bot
